## Properties

| Property             | Attribute  | Description    | Type           | Default     |
| -------------------- | ---------- | -------------- | -------------- | ----------- |
| `disabled`           | `disabled` | Disabled state | `boolean`      | `false`     |
| `hint`               | `hint`     | Hint text      | `string`       | `undefined` |
| `label` _(required)_ | `label`    | Label          | `string`       | `undefined` |
| `options`            | --         | Options        | `SelectItem[]` | `[]`        |
| `required`           | `required` | Required       | `boolean`      | `false`     |
| `value`              | `value`    | Value          | `string`       | `''`        |


## Events

| Event    | Description                        | Type               |
| -------- | ---------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `change` | Emitted when the value has changed | `CustomEvent<any>` |


## Slots

| Slot       | Description                                |
| ---------- | ------------------------------------------ |
| `"native"` | Native select that contributes to the form |
